item.title: Bicycle thefts in Toronto
item.description: Abstraction Since bicycles entered the human history, they have been helping improve human beingsâ€™ lives in many aspects. They offer a cheaper, healthier way for people to travel around the city and provides a solution to better environments. Therefore, It is very necessary to understand which part of the city has occurred more bicycle thefts and we need to be careful when entering these areas so as to reduce the chances of getting our friend stolen.
